text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone (GSM Factory Unlocked) - Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB, 5MP Camera, 3G 900/2100 MHz, International Version - White

Item specifications:
Quad Band 2G, 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz
Dual SIM Support, Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4.3 Inch TFT capacitive touchscreen
768MB RAM, 4GB ROM, Support microSD Slot
5MP Rear Camera + LED Flash, with autofocus, Geo-tagging, touch focus
1800 mAh Battery, Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, Android 4.3 Jelly Bean
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

Product description:
text.Response A: The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C is a 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone running on a Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU with 4GB of ROM and 768MB of RAM. The phone comes with a 5MP Rear Camera with LED Flash, autofocus, and touch focus, as well as a 0.3MP VGA Front Camera. It has a 1800 mAh removable Li-Ion Battery, and supports microSD memory cards up to 32GB. The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C runs on Android 4.3 Jelly Bean and includes WiFi, GPS, Bluetooth, and 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz connectivity. Please note this phone is an international version and may not include a US warranty.
text.Response B: The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone is a compact, advanced mobile communications device that combines cutting-edge smartphone technology with easy-to-use Android operating system functionality. This international version GSM factory unlocked smartphone is equipped with a dual core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB of onboard storage memory and a 4.3 inch TFT capacitive touchscreen display, providing an intuitive graphical user interface for easy navigation and control. Additional features include 5MP rear camera with LED flash and autofocus, 3G 900/2100 MHz HSDPA data connectivity, WiFi networking, Bluetooth 4.0, GPS navigation, and an 1800 mAh battery for extended operation. Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

Product description:

Response A

The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C is a 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone running on a Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU with 4GB of ROM and 768MB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone is a compact, advanced mobile communications device that combines cutting-edge smartphone technology with easy-to-use Android operating system functionality. This international version GSM factory unlocked smartphone is equipped with a dual core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB of onboard storage memory and a 4.3 inch TFT capacitive touchscreen display, providing an intuitive graphical user interface for easy navigation and control. Additional features include 5MP rear camera with LED flash and autofocus, 3G 900/2100 MHz HSDPA data connectivity, WiFi networking, Bluetooth 4.0, GPS navigation, and an 1800 mAh battery for extended operation. Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
